text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Starfield. The build quality of the Acer Aspire 7 A715-72G-79BH 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 4 GB GDDR5 VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the Acer Aspire 7 A715-72G-79BH 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 4 GB GDDR5 VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Aspire 7 A715-72G-79BH 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 4 GB GDDR5 VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the Acer Aspire 7 A715-72G-79BH 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 4 GB GDDR5 VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Starfield. The build quality of the Acer Aspire 7 A715-72G-79BH 15.6" IPS GTX 1050 4 GB GDDR5 VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
